title: Game crashes during in game every game
body: Every game I crash during the first 3 minutes of the game. This has happened for a week now! Please help! Is this happening to anyone?!

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail around the crash? Do you get a bugsplat error or a network connection error? With a bit more info, I can point you in the right direction.
It just says that League of Legends has stopped working and kicks me out of the game. No bugsplat notices

Welp it's been a week  now and it just seems that it isn't working, I still crash during early stages into the game still, but also now have the problem of my client freezing (not responding) or just right out crashing though this happens a lot less.

That really sucks. Let's get you in contact with one of our tech specialists. If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can work with you further to resolve this.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask them.

This happened/happens to me too even after repair. My connection is completely stable. It seems this problem lies elsewhere. I'm on Windows 10 but other people are saying they have it on other versions too.
Edit: I also reinstalled and it did not fix anything. This is not a connection problem I think.
Did you also create a support ticket? That's definitely what I'd recommend at this point.
I use windows 10 also, though the problem doesn't seem to have started from a patch.
